Class Appointments

java.lang.Object
Model.Appointments
public class Appointments extends Object

    • withinBusinessHours

      public static boolean withinBusinessHours(LocalDateTime appointmentStart, LocalDateTime appointmentEnd)
      This is the method to determine whether a created appointment is made within the business operating hours.
      Parameters:
      appointmentStart - Appointment Start Time
      appointmentEnd - Appointment End Time
      Returns:
      true/false Whether it galls in operating business hours

    • overlapCheck

      public static boolean overlapCheck(int customerId, LocalDateTime appointmentStartTime, LocalDateTime appointmentEndTime) throws SQLException
      This method will check whether an Appointment is made for a Customer and that it doesn't overlap any other Appointment's that Customer may have made.
      Parameters:
      customerId - Customer ID
      appointmentStartTime - Appointment Start Time
      appointmentEndTime - Appointment End Time
      Returns:
      true/false Whether it overlaps a Customer's Appointment.
      Throws:
      SQLException
